metadata.synopsis: Two kids are debating sneaking into the circus. This girl is pro sneaking in and is DETERMINED.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to -12; 52; -34- Talk to the human girl near the circus fence.

0.speaker: Izzy
0.text: We're gonna see the mummy, the dryad, the djinni - everything! So don't even think about trying to stop us.

1.speaker: Izzy
1.text: I don't care what anyone says, I'm going to the circus.
